title: What is the advantage of buying an iPhone rather than another phone? - Quora

response.answer_text: iPhones only come out a single model each year so the phone gets old only one generation each year, since there are not a huge amount of models the company has less to worry about giving out updates so you get constant iOS updates every year even on an older iPhone. iOS is smooth and easy compared to Android or other os, the processor is more powerful and once you start using it you'll know the difference. Basically it's all on your choice

Iphone will help you in becoming rich as anyone who would see iPhone in your hand will say-”this person is rich man see he has a iPhone”. Nothing more than that advantage is there for buying an iPhone.
